revised_title: Effects of Lightning: Observations and Analysis
tldr: The author, Jos. Wasse, shares his observations and experiences of the effects of lightning in a letter to Dr. Mead. He describes the lasting impact of lightning on the environment, such as the Fairy Circles, and the physical damage it can cause to humans and animals. Wasse also discusses the force of lightning and its similarities to a wind-gun with compressed air.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Atmospheric Science
